event.title: include remains of the elliptical Roman amphitheatre (1st century AD

data.event: Points of interest include remains of the elliptical Roman amphitheatre (1st century AD) and the Archaeological Museum.

event.title: Captured by the Goths in the following century

data.event: Captured by the Goths in the following century, it was reconquered by the Byzantines in 552, who however lost it to the Lombards in 642.
